item.description:
So what are we going to do for this Girl's Night?! Christmas of course!

I'm hoping we'll have a theme for every month, and rotate to each others' houses or to different locales. It'll be a great way to get out, make new friends, and have something to look forward to each month.

At the meeting, we will choose the date for the next Girl's Night, the location, the host, and the theme!

This Month's Girl's Night:
1. Date: Saturday, December 11th at 5pm
2. Location: Tammy's house in Westbrook
3. Host: Tammy
4. Theme: Christmas!


We'll have food, drinks, and decorate Christmas ornaments! It should be a great time!

Please sign up to bring one of the following by adding a comment when you RSVP and bring enough of these items for 20 people:

1. Ornaments - The following package is available at Target for $15. We need a package with at least 20 ornaments that we can decorate.
http://www.target.com...
2. Glitter, Glue, and Permanent Markers
3. Fabric, Ribbon, and Lace
4. Sequins, Scissors, and Buttons
5. 1 bottle of red wine and 1 bottle of white wine.
6. Soda & Juice
7. Margarita Mix & Strawberries
8. Tequila
9. Soup (a chowder - something warm for the cold month!)
10. Soup (a chili - something warm for the cold month!)
11. Stuffed mushrooms
12. Cookies and Cake
13. Pies (Chocolate pie & a fruit pie maybe?)
14. Twice baked potatoes
15. Vegetables & Candles (I know, weird combo, but price wise it worked out!)
16. Chips, Dip, and Salsa
17. Shrimp
18. Macaroni and Cheese
19. Salad
20. Rolls & Butter

***Please feel free to bring anything else in addition to the item you selected to add to our menu.***
***Please bring a Yankee Swap gift under $10***

You do not need to spend a lot on the items you have to bring. Our goal is to spend less than $15 for each item and less than $10 for each Yankee Swap gift. At MOST, you should be spending $20-25 for this event. If you need help finding items within these price ranges, let me know and I'll send you suggestions.

I hope to see you there!
item.name: Girls Night! Theme: Christmas
